document_data.name: Tanataskar Moonwind
document_data.mainbody: '''Tanataskar Moonwind''' was the [[curse]]d owner of the [[Cointoss]] tavern in [[Yartar]] around [[1370 DR]].
document_data.History:
Once, Tanataksar was an adventurer devoted to [[Tempus]] but offended the god with his pride and Tempus cursed him. Whenever he drew blood in a fight, he went berserk, ''[[blink]]ing'' and attacking random people, while broken weapons constantly fell out of his body, with no consequence for him. He consulted many [[wizard]]s and priests of Tempus in order to find a cure but to no avail. He also stopped adventuring, in order to not risk endangering friends or fellow adventurers. He remained in his tavern and listened to stories of adventures. 
However, in his dreams, Tempus said to him that a great task awaited him.
